Method Detail

openSession

public static org.hibernate.Session openSession()
Starts a new session and stores it in the context of the current thread.

getCurrentSession

public static org.hibernate.Session getCurrentSession()
Gets the currently active Hibernate session (for the current thread). Returns null if the current thread do not have an active session.

commitTransaction

public static void commitTransaction()
Commits the active transaction and immediately starts a new one. The session remains active.

rollbackTransaction

public static void rollbackTransaction()
Rollbacks the active transaction.

closeSession

public static void closeSession()
